refsect1.title: Filing a bug report or feature request
refsect1.para: If you encounter a bug, misfeature, or missing feature in libgretl, please file a bug report or feature request at sourceforge.

refsect1.title: Mailing lists
refsect1.para: There are two main mailing lists dedicated to gretl.

listitem.para: gretl-users covers general gretl topics from the standpoint of users of the programs gretl and gretlcli.

gretl-devel is for discussion of work on gretl itself. It is not for asking questions about how to use gretl, but is the right place for asking questions about developing and running programs that use libgretl.
